availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Walter Leonard Clements (Union County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Payne Clements in Union County on October 7, 1833. Father of Joseph Leonard Clements, Sarah Ann Clements Clements, William Clements, Aaron Clements, Susan Clements Higginson, George Clements, Martha Clements, Julia Clements, and Walter Clements. Owned eight enslaved persons in Union County in 1840. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Employed Lee Borne in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.
